title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, the checkboxes used for selecting projects should display a busy cursor during the updating process.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects:
EB: The checkboxes used for selecting projects should display a busy cursor during the updating process.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Initiate the export Zip process. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose file types and select some. 5. Press ok.
